EmailTemplate.name: EB-09-15-202209-EMP-CHBC-NSWLTR-Partner-Essentials-Newsletter-Consultant.Partner
EmailTemplate.subject: Fresh ways we're improving outcomes for employers
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Partner Essentials FEATURED Integrated chronic condition programs improve more than just health outcomes In a recent study of more than 24,000 Teladoc Health members with multiple chronic conditions, the data consistently shows that integrated chronic care management programs result in better clinical outcomes, lower costs and a better member experience. Insights include: - Members enrolled in multiple programs engage more and see greater improvement. - For members with uncontrolled chronic conditions, our program delivers meaningful results immediately and sustains these results over time. “The results of this large-scale study clearly demonstrate the power and value of whole-person care. When people have access to a single, high-quality source of support for their chronic physical and mental health needs, they achieve better results across the board.” EVENTS Strategies for addressing whole-person care for those living with chronic conditions September 29 | 2 p.m. Eastern Register now <[[https://www.benefitnews.com/cms/preview/share-view?previewId=00000182-ad20-dde9-ab92-ede3ecb50000&bt_ee_preview=CdQFX68vQXkHkS6A9gqCKARFOh6%2B%2Fcn54fYp2PvgJaJJiPFGaUi7cU5w3ZbrjN2A&bt_ts_preview=1660762653950]]> During this live webinar, we will highlight key findings of the recent Teladoc Health consumer study on the impact of chronic condition management. Speakers: Glen Davis, MD, MBA VP, Clinical Programs, Teladoc Health Cameron Betts Senior Principal, Health & Benefits Consultant, Mercer Jessy Moreno Rosales VP, Total Rewards North America, SAP Moderator: Nabomita Dutta VP, Commercial Strategy, Teladoc Health HLTH 2022 November 13-16 | Las Vegas, NV Register now <[[https://www.hlth.com/2022event/program-overview]]> Join us in Las Vegas and be sure to catch Jason Gorevic, CEO of Teladoc Health, speak about the future of virtual care. RESOURCES Why Teladoc Health Q&A with Lara Bunn <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/6329d4df25e9e21bb24b08e2]]> It's always good to put a face to a name in our industry, especially when it's a friendly one! Meet our own Lara Bunn, Vice President, Strategic Partnerships here at Teladoc Health. Forum Featured Session Multi-program chronic condition solutions amplify outcomes <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/resources/video/forum-2022-multi-program-chronic-care-management/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=forum-2022&utm_term=consultant&utm_campaign=september-partner-essentials&utm_campaign_id=]]> Hear real-world insights from organizations that are successfully helping people with chronic conditions live healthier lives. Forum on demand <[[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgG6qC9QGBk6nQY6Egmz2Dw/playlists]]> Forum 2022 may be over, but you can rewatch your favorite presentations or catch any you may have missed. Member testimonial <[[https://view.highspot.com/viewer/6320dc0232d1d1e4a7a01fe7]]> Hear how Ray uses our chronic condition management solution to achieve better health. Virtual Care Transformation Scorecard <[[https://scorecard.teladochealth.com/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=scorecard&utm_term=consultant&utm_campaign=september-partner-essentials&utm_campaign_id=]]> Advance your organization’s virtual care strategy from where it is today to where you want it to be. Take just two minutes now to see how you score. IN THE NEWS Integrated Chronic Care Solutions by Teladoc Health deliver improved health outcomes <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/newsroom/press/release/New-Data-ShowsTeladoc-Healths-Integrated-Chronic-Care-Solutions-Deliver-Improved-Health-Outcomes/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=Chronic-Care-Solutions-Deliver-Improved-Health-Outcomes&utm_term=consultant&utm_campaign=september-partner-essentials&utm_campaign_id=]]> New Teladoc CMO Vidya Raman-Tangella on the telehealth giant’s clinical strategy and new products <[[https://www.healthcaredive.com/news/teladoc-raman-tangella-chief-medical-officer-q-and-a/627226/]]> Teladoc Health adds home A1c testing to Chronic Care Solution <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/newsroom/press/release/Teladoc-Health-Makes-A1C-Testing-Easier-for-Members-with-Diabetes/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=&utm_content=at-home-testing&utm_term=consultant&utm_campaign=september-partner-essentials&utm_campaign_id=]]> TAFA urges senate leaders to extend telehealth flexibilities <[[https://www.realclearhealth.com/articles/2022/08/24/the_house_acted_to_protect_telehealth_access_now_its_the_senates_turn.html]]> HCSC launching Virtual Primary Care in 2023 <[[https://www.hcsc.com/newsroom/news-releases/2022/virtual-primary-care-launching-2023]]> FAST FACT Lowering healthcare costs and making more affordable coverage possible are among employers’ top future healthcare reform priorities. <[[https://www.businessgrouphealth.org/resources/2023-large-employers-health-care-strategy-survey-intro]]> Affordability of mental health services ranks among the top areas of focus for 24% of employers, with many looking to low- to no-cost virtual health as the answer. Source: Business Group on Health. “2023 Large Employers’ Health Care Strategy and Plan Design Survey.” August 2022. https://www.businessgrouphealth.org/ resources/2023-large-employers-health-care-strategy-survey-intro About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
